On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Tom

 Bryant Park

⏲ 1:48 p.m. on Wednesday, December 11

What are you doing today?

I’m enjoying the view of Bryant Park, watching the skaters go by, enjoying the nice clear day, and enjoying myself.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Probably when the sun is out and it’s not too cold.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Probably just taking a walk around the city. Enjoying the sites of the Christmas season. I like to walk for exercise instead of staying home all cooped up, watching TV. I like to get out and get some pounds off.
